thread.title: Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall and Jesy Nelson flaunt figures
thread.title_full: Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall and Jesy Nelson flaunt figures | Daily Mail Online

author: Rebecca Davison for MailOnline
title: Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall and Jesy Nelson flaunt figures
text:
Their racy stage ensembles have attracted plenty of attention in recent weeks.
But Jade Thirlwall rocked her saucy two-piece with confidence on Thursday, as she prepared to take to the stage for another energetic performance in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
The 24-year-old took to Instagram to show off her enviably toned figure in a racy bra top and hot pants - just hours after bandmate Jesy Nelson displayed her rock hard abs in a sexy underwear snap.
Scroll down for video
Little Minx! Jade Thirlwall rocked her saucy stage costume with confidence on Thursday, as she prepared to take to the stage for another energetic performance in Tulsa, Oklahoma
The South Shields native posed with attitude in a tiny pair of hot pants for the snap, which cinched in at her middle to flaunt her enviably tiny waist and leave her leggy frame on show.
She paired the racy briefs with a matching bra top, which saucily plunged at her chest, before adding knee-high boots to further elongate her long and lean pins.
The singer then left her brunette tresses in sexy tousled waves which she swept off her face, to showcase her glowing complexion and striking features in all their glory.
Clearly raring to go for another high energy set, Jade captioned the shot: 'Tulsa...you ready? #dangerouswomantour'
That's one way to make them forget: Little Mix's Jesy Nelson showed off her envy-inducing abs in red Calvin Klein underwear on Instagram... just a day after dropping the F-bomb on stage
Look sporty in a scarlet bralet like Jesy in Calvin Klein £30 Calvin Klein modern cotton bralette
Shop it here at House of Fraser
Buy now
Jesy Nelson looked smokin' hot in this Instagram snap she recently posted.
The Little Mix star showed off her toned abs in a bralet and we couldn't be more jealous of how ripped she looks!
Of course that's not just any old bralet either, it is a Calvin Klein bralet seen on the likes of Gigi Hadid and Kendall Jenner to name just a few. CK underwear is hot right now and it's the only lingerie to be seen in. Forget lacy numbers, it's all about the banded bralet with a cool sporty feel!
If you want to sizzle in a scarlet bralet like Jesy, click right to snap it up now from House of Fraser.
There are plenty of similar options available around the web though if you don't want to be a copycat. Check out bras from Mango, Prettylittlething.com, Charli Cohen and South Beach below.

The girls are clearly in a fierce mood, as the photo follows another saucy snap posted by bandmate Jesy Nelson only hours before.
The 25-year-old Little Mix star showed off a stomach honed to perfection as she posed in skimpy red Calvin Klein underwear for her own sexy post.
Pouting for the camera, she looked sultry as her ombre curls cascaded down past her waist.
She simply captioned the image with a kissing lips emoji as she no doubt delighted her legions of followers.
Little Minx! The girls proved they could still have fun as they caused a stir during rehearsals on Tuesday
Little Mix are currently touring with Ariana Grande on her US Dangerous Woman tour.
But despite their high profile gig, the band proved they could still have fun as they caused a stir during rehearsals on Tuesday.
Jesy had bandmates Perrie Edwards, Leigh-Anne Pinnock and Jade Thirlwall in hysterics after she dropped the F-bomb mid-song on stage.
As the talented foursome harmonised acapella into their microphones, Jesy hit a rather flat note.
Oops! Jesy Nelson had bandmates Perrie Edwards, Leigh-Anne Pinnock and Jade Thirlwall in hysterics after she dropped the F-bomb mid-song on stage
Swearing loudly into the microphone, her bandmates were first seen looking surprised- then bursting into hits of hysteria.
Such was their amusement, they were unable to continue their song as they suffered a bout of giggles.
And Jesy uploaded the hilarious video to her Instagram for their fans, captioning it: 'When it just ain't happening!'.
Meanwhile the girls recently came under fire after they were suspected of photoshopping Jesy's waist in the new Touch video.
Honest: Jesy uploaded the hilarious video to her Instagram for their fans, captioning it: 'When it just ain't happening!'
At the beginning of the month eagle-eyed fans claimed the bizarre tell-tale curves in the lines of the stripy background - focused around Jesy's thighs and waist - were evidence her figure had been digitally altered.
However behind the scenes footage released shortly afterwards confirmed the wall had a right angle, quickly dispelling the rumours.
Jesy previously said she believed any size should be celebrated and that confidence in your body is sexy.
She told The Sun: 'We're happy to be how we are, and don't care if we put on a couple of pounds.
Unfounded: Meanwhile the girls recently came under fire after they were suspected of photoshopping Jesy's waist in the new Touch video- which was later proved false
'I feel like curves are really in at the moment – I love that they're celebrated.'
The girls appearance comes as they are set to perform at the BRITs later this month alongside Robbie Williams, The 1975 and Emeli Sandé.
Most recently Bruno Mars and Skepta were the latest acts announced to take to The O2 Arena stage on February 22.
This year’s awards will be hosted by Dermot O’Leary and Emma Willis after Michael Buble pulled out of presenting duties in light of his son Noah's illness.
This year will also see Clara Amfo, Laura Jackson and Alice Levine host The BRIT Awards 2017: Red Carpet and Backstage on ITV2, either side of the main awards show.
Strength to strength: The girls appearance comes as they are set to perform at the BRITs later this month alongside Robbie Williams, The 1975 and Emeli Sandé
